articles.title: Kim Jong Il's famous work published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's famous work published in Bangladesh 
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Natun Bangla Publishing House in Bangladesh published a famous work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" in booklet on June 8 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea.
   The booklet said in the preface that he has performed exploits  worthy of special note in history by leading the ruling party, the state and the army of the DPRK for 35 years.

articles.content:
S. Korean authorities purchase weapons
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities signed a "memorandum of understanding" for purchase of weapons with Netherlands on June 8, according to a Seoul-based radio report.   This brought the number of countries from which they purchase weapons to 16 including the United States and Britain.
